title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma…) with a single CLI or REST API; macOS/Linux/Windows binaries included.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client; sync & async helpers, streaming, chat & embed endpoints.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers (fetch-based).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering LLM, chat, embed and tool-calling wrappers around Ollama.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; folders, shareable chats, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library with fluent API, streaming, and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax-highlighted REPL, chat history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing Generator, ChatGenerator and Embedder nodes backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: PDF chat, voice bots, function-calling, Kubernetes deployment, GPU tuning.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (cuda, rocm, cpu) and docker-compose examples.

title: ollama-macos-swift
summary: Swift Package for macOS/iOS apps; async/await wrappers around the HTTP API.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds “Ask Ollama” modal for summarizing notes, brainstorming, and Q&A.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot with slash commands, conversation memory, and per-server model settings.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama chat/completions inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin for AI-assisted block summarization and brainstorming using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate with async client, SSE streaming, and embed endpoints.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client generated from OpenAPI specs; supports chat, embed, and model management.
